meta.title: LAB SEVEN Specifications | Labrador Field Systems
meta.description: Complete technical specifications for LAB SEVEN battery system. 60A output, 7.5kWh capacity, 1-hour fast charging.

hero.title: Professional-Grade Power in a Portable Package
hero.description: Complete technical specifications for LAB SEVEN. 60A Bates output, 7.5kWh LiFePO4 battery, 1-hour fast charging, professional monitoring and safety systems.

items.title: Power Output
items.description: 10kW continuous, 12kW peak. 60A Bates connector plus three independent 20A Edison circuits. Professional power for demanding applications.

items.title: Battery System
items.description: 7.5kWh LiFePO4 (LFP) chemistry. 16S48P configuration, 3000+ cycle lifespan. JBD BMS with real-time monitoring and cell balancing.

items.title: Charging & Runtime
items.description: 1-hour fast charging from 60A input, 4-5 hours from standard 110V. Runtime: 45 minutes to 8+ hours depending on load.

items.title: Power Output
items.description: 60A Bates Connector: 1x 60A output (Stage Pin) | 20A Edison: 3x 20A outputs (NEMA 5-20R) | Continuous: 10kW sustained | Peak: 12kW for 30 seconds

items.title: Battery System
items.description: Capacity: 7.5kWh LiFePO4 | Configuration: 16S48P (51.2V nominal) | BMS: JBD with balancing | Lifespan: 3000+ cycles at 80% DOD

items.title: Charging
items.description: Fast: 1 hour 0-100% (60A input) | Standard: 4-5 hours (110V) | Input: Up to 7.2kW max, auto-adjusting

items.title: Physical
items.description: Dimensions: 24" W × 18" D × 36" H | Weight: ~180 lbs (82 kg) | Construction: Welded steel, powder-coated | Mobility: 4x industrial casters

items.title: Safety & Monitoring
items.description: Chemistry: LiFePO4 (safest lithium) | Protection: Per-circuit breakers, BMS | Display: 4.3" color touchscreen | Remote: Bluetooth + WiFi monitoring

items.title: Environmental
items.description: Operating: -10°C to 50°C (14°F to 122°F) | Storage: -20°C to 60°C | Humidity: 5-95% RH | Altitude: Up to 10,000 ft
